content.title: Holy Dramatic Backlighting For Lego Plants, Batman! We're Funded!
content.creator:
Tom Berarducci - TNB Technologies, LLC
February 24, 2025
content.content:
The plants that I, thankfully, am incapable of killing (plus BL!NKr's warm color palette in a theater-style animation)
First off, I hope everyone had a great weekend. I cannot believe that we've already met our goal!! Thank you all again for your support :D
Now that I know I'm funded, I can start preparing for my fulfillment process so I can get your rewards to you ASAP! Please help keep the momentum going to further exceed our goal by spreading the word about what we're doing - I'm excited to see how far this goes!
I'll keep you all informed about my progress as we move forward and let you know what's happening every step of the way :)
If I can clarify anything, answer any questions, or showcase a specific feature you're interested in, I'd be happy to - please feel free to comment and discuss!
-Sara

content.title: Thank you so much for the incredible progress!
content.creator:
Tom Berarducci - TNB Technologies, LLC
February 22, 2025
content.content:
In the first 24 hours since BL!NKr's launch, we've come so far! I'm so grateful for all of your support! I hope we can keep this momentum going - please share out on social media and send it to others who might be interested!
Thank you all again! Have a wonderful rest of your day :)
-Sara
